Content1.1:
To cope with the fierce competition, constant innovation, volatile industrial landscapes, and increased customer expectation, we continually enhance our Consultants’ skills in the industry to help our clients search for the most suitable candidate and help our candidates to land on their dream job to develop their career. Our clients range from multinational corporates to market leaders and many visionary start-ups so as their investors.

OCG has significant experience within the practice including :
List2.1:
• Front End Developers
  • Back End Developers
  • Mobile Developers
  • UX/UI Designers
  • Data Analysts
  • Internet of Things ( IoT )
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • AR / VR
  • Blockchain
  • Banking IT
List2.2:
• Marketing
  • Public Relations & Event Planners
  • Advertising
  • Entertainment
